metadata.title: CVE-2018-0734 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: The OpenSSL DSA signature algorithm has been shown to be vulnerable to a timing side channel attack. An attacker could use variations in the signing algorithm to recover the private key. Fixed in OpenSSL 1.1.1a (Affected 1.1.1). Fixed in OpenSSL 1.1.0j (Affected 1.1.0-1.1.0i). Fixed in OpenSSL 1.0.2q (Affected 1.0.2-1.0.2p).

notes.note: mdeslaur> there are other similar commits in crypto/dsa/dsa_ossl.c that likely need backporting also. upstream advisory was ammended with more commits

criterions.comment: openssl package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.1.1a-1ubuntu2').
